<?php
return PhpCsFixer\Config::create() ->setUsingCache(false) ->setRules(array( '@Symfony' => true, 'single_blank_line_before_namespace' => false, 'no_blank_lines_before_namespace' => true, 'concat_without_spaces' => false, 'concat_with_spaces' => true, 'pre_increment' => false, 'phpdoc_summary' => false, 'phpdoc_single_line_var_spacing' => false, 'phpdoc_separation' => false, 'phpdoc_var_without_name' => false, 'heredoc_to_nowdoc' => false, 'single_quote' => false, 'phpdoc_no_package' => false, )) ->finder( PhpCsFixer\Finder::create() ->exclude('tests/Fixtures') ->in(__DIR__) ) ;
